sys_script_include.name: StateAutoPopulate

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_548ef71447443110ff8e8a88536d4352
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_427498_abis.StateAutoPopulate</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>StateAutoPopulate</name><script><![CDATA[var StateAutoPopulate = Class.create();
StateAutoPopulate.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getFavorites: function() {

		var id = this.getParameter('sysparm_caller'); // to get parameter from client side
		gs.info(' anitha callidis' + id);

		var loc = new GlideRecord('x_427498_abis_location_india');
		loc.addQuery('sys_id', id);
		loc.query();
		if (loc.next()) {
			gs.info("Chetan State : " + loc.state);
			this._addFavorite("state", loc.state);
			//this._addFavorite("country", loc.country);

		}
	},


	_addFavorite: function(name,value) {

		var favs = this.newItem("favorite");
		favs.setAttribute("name", name);
		favs.setAttribute("value", value);
	},


	type: 'StateAutoPopulate'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-11 22:20:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>548ef71447443110ff8e8a88536d4352</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StateAutoPopulate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ABiS" source="x_427498_abis">269ad56c47332110ff8e8a88536d4359</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ABiS">269ad56c47332110ff8e8a88536d4359</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_548ef71447443110ff8e8a88536d4352</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-11 22:59:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
